languages.text: "Я был рядом с трупом их связного — им надо было понять, как я раскрыл их и что еще знаю. Из меня выбивали ответы, долго и изощренно. А я молчал, потому что знал: начну говорить, и от меня тут же избавятся".

"I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."
languages.original_text: "Я был рядом с трупом их связного — им надо было понять, как я раскрыл их и что еще знаю. Из меня выбивали ответы, долго и изощренно. А я молчал, потому что знал: начну говорить, и от меня тут же избавятся".

languages.text: 「私は彼らの連絡役の死体のすぐそばにいました。だから連中は、私がどうやって突き止めたのか、さらに何を知っているのかを知りたがりました。彼らは私から答えを引き出そうと、長い間執拗に痛めつけました。だが私は一言も口を割りませんでした。なぜなら、一度でも喋り始めたら、すぐに処分されるとわかっていたからです」
languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."

traits.locale_text: 「私は彼らの連絡役の死体のすぐそばにいました。だから連中は、私がどうやって突き止めたのか、さらに何を知っているのかを知りたがりました。彼らは私から答えを引き出そうと、長い間執拗に痛めつけました。だが私は一言も口を割りませんでした。なぜなら、一度でも喋り始めたら、すぐに処分されるとわかっていたからです」

languages.text: "Ich lag direkt neben der Leiche ihres Kontakts – sie mussten erfahren, wie ich ihnen auf die Spur gekommen war und was ich sonst noch über sie wusste. Sie versuchten, die Antworten aus mir herauszuprügeln, lange und brutal. Ich sagte nichts, denn ich wusste, sobald ich anfing, zu reden, würden sie mich entsorgen."
languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich lag direkt neben der Leiche ihres Kontakts – sie mussten erfahren, wie ich ihnen auf die Spur gekommen war und was ich sonst noch über sie wusste. Sie versuchten, die Antworten aus mir herauszuprügeln, lange und brutal. Ich sagte nichts, denn ich wusste, sobald ich anfing, zu reden, würden sie mich entsorgen."

languages.text: « Je me trouvais juste à côté du cadavre de leur contact. Ils devaient absolument découvrir comment j'avais appris leur existence et ce que je savais sur eux. Ils ont tenté de me faire parler... en employant des méthodes très convaincantes. Mais je n'ai rien avoué, car je savais très bien que si j'ouvrais la bouche, ils se débarrasseraient de moi dans la foulée. »
languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."

traits.locale_text: « Je me trouvais juste à côté du cadavre de leur contact. Ils devaient absolument découvrir comment j'avais appris leur existence et ce que je savais sur eux. Ils ont tenté de me faire parler... en employant des méthodes très convaincantes. Mais je n'ai rien avoué, car je savais très bien que si j'ouvrais la bouche, ils se débarrasseraient de moi dans la foulée. »

languages.text: «Me hallaron junto al cadáver de su contacto; querían averiguar cómo los había descubierto y qué más sabía sobre ellos. Intentaron sacarme las respuestas a golpes; se cebaron conmigo. Mantuve la boca cerrada, porque sabía que en cuanto empezase a hablar, era hombre muerto».
languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."

traits.locale_text: «Me hallaron junto al cadáver de su contacto; querían averiguar cómo los había descubierto y qué más sabía sobre ellos. Intentaron sacarme las respuestas a golpes; se cebaron conmigo. Mantuve la boca cerrada, porque sabía que en cuanto empezase a hablar, era hombre muerto».

languages.text: “当时我就在他们联络人的尸体旁边，他们想弄清楚我是怎么发现他们的，想弄清楚我还知道哪些其他事情。他们打算从我嘴里撬出答案，用了不少方法，但我却紧紧地闭上了嘴。因为我知道，一旦我开了口，他们就会把我处理掉。”
languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."

traits.locale_text: “当时我就在他们联络人的尸体旁边，他们想弄清楚我是怎么发现他们的，想弄清楚我还知道哪些其他事情。他们打算从我嘴里撬出答案，用了不少方法，但我却紧紧地闭上了嘴。因为我知道，一旦我开了口，他们就会把我处理掉。”

languages.text: "Bağlantılarının cesedi, tam yanımda yatıyordu. Planlarını nasıl öğrendiğimi ve haklarında başka neler bildiğimi öğrenmek zorundaydılar. Döverek ağzımdan laf almaya çalıştılar. Saatlerce, ellerini korkak alıştırmadan... Tek kelime etmedim çünkü ağzımı açar açmaz benden kurtulacaklarının farkındaydım."
languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."

traits.locale_text: "Bağlantılarının ölü bedeni, tam yanımda yatıyordu. Planlarını nasıl öğrendiğimi ve haklarında başka neler bildiğimi öğrenmek zorundaydılar. Döverek ağzımdan laf almaya çalıştılar. Saatlerce ve ellerini hiç korkak alıştırmadan... Tek kelime etmedim çünkü ağzımı açar açmaz benden kurtulacaklarının farkındaydım."

languages.original_text: "I was right by their contact's corpse — they had to know how I found them out and what else I knew about them. They tried to beat the answers out of me, tried long and hard. I kept my mouth shut, because I knew that the second I started talking, they would dispose of me."
